name: Truck Transport Simulator
description:
Become a truck driver in this exciting new Truck Transport Simulator game.

Transport cargo to the destination. You can choose a huge set of trucks to drive around the cities and the country side! Levels with mini-map provides additional challenge requiring your navigational skills.

FEATURES

• 14 Super Truck and Cargo Model
• AAA Truck Physics Engine
• Realistic Weather Conditions and Day/Night Cycle
• Amazing Engine Sounds
• Easy Controls (tilt, buttons and touch steering wheel)
• Improved AI traffic system
• Achievements and Leaderboards
